### Layout {#ab0fbcd8c52e2d9e44def1a54e3e7db6e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="SSPLayoutMap llvm::SSPLayoutInfo::Layout">
Layout - Mapping of allocations to the required SSPLayoutKind.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stackprotector">StackProtector</a> analysis will update this map when determining if an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> triggers a stack protector.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/stackprotector-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/stackprotector-h">StackProtector.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
